dialogue.introduction: Kagerou-class Destroyer tenth ship. Tokitsukaze... has arrived!
dialogue.library_intro: Tenth Kagerou-class Destroyer, Tokitsukaze. I worked hard in the 16th Destroyer Division with my friends Yukikaze, Hatsukaze, and Amatsukaze. I was also in the 2nd Torpedo Squadron you know, really, really. But...an uncontrolled sea seems...kinda unpleasant.
dialogue.secretary2: Nn? What, what? What is it?
dialogue.secretary3: What is it, Yukikaze, stop it. Eh? ...Huh... Commander, what are you doing? I'll hit you.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Commander, Commander! Commaaandeer! Hey! Hey, can't you hear me? Hey!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Commander, have you seen Yukikaze? Hmm, is that so. Then, you're fine as well! Hey~ Hey~
dialogue.wedding: Commander, what's the matter? Are you looking for Hatsukaze? Wrong? Amatsukaze? That's wrong too? Then who? Huh? Ah, me? W-why? Err, err... Thanks♪
dialogue.show_players_score: Commander, looking at scores? Tokitsukaze also wanna look, wanna look!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Haa. I want to clean up a bit.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Going to soak in the bath. Sorry-.
dialogue.ship_construction: Commander, they said a new ship is done.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Haaa, tired, tired~. The fleet has returned.
dialogue.mvp: Hou hou, so Tokitsukaze is first, huh. That's good, pretty good!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: I ha-te unreasonable operations, I really ha-te them.
dialogue.sunk: I'm... first again, huh... that's okay... Yukikaze, Hatsukaze, Amatsukaze... See, you... again...
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Hey Commaaand~ It’s been two years! That was fast! I was surprised too! I’m so glad, y'know~
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: I don't like the rainy season~ It's unpleasant~. At times like this, I'll just climb at the commander's head! Garuru~
dialogue.early_summer_2015: Commanderrrr! It's almost summertime! Let's go swimming with Yukikaze this summer. Okay? Okayyyy????
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Commander! It's summer! Let's go to the sea! Not on a sortie, you know! Come on, quickly, quickly, quickly-!
dialogue.christmas_2015: Commander ~ It's Christmas! This cake is so gooood ~! You want some too? Here, ah...
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: It's already the end of year~. A single year sure passes by quickly, really. Eh? New Year's Eve cleaning? Me too? Why?
dialogue.new_year_2016: Commander, Happy New Year! Take care of me this year too! Humu? We're going to pull fortunes?

hourly.0000: Commander, it's 00:00! Um... commander? What are you doing?
hourly.0100: 01:00. Commander, what are you doing in midnight? Let me see it too!
hourly.0200: 02:00. Commander, keeping secrets from me is not good. Not goooood!
hourly.0300: 03:00. Fighting with commander is really tiring... To think he's hiding it until the end...
hourly.0400: 04:00. Whatever. I'll look for it with Yukikaze and the others later, when Commander is asleep.
hourly.0500: 05:00. Commander, it's morning! Totally, totally morning!
hourly.0600: 06:00. Commander, make breakfast please! ...eeh, you can't? Liar, you can't be.
hourly.0700: 07:00. Well, it can't be helped. Let's go together to Mamiya's place, commander!
hourly.0800: 08:00. Mamiya's breakfast delicious. Me? Impossible, totally.
hourly.0900: 09:00. Now then, I should probably call Yukikaze and others for sortie! Sortie, sortie♪
hourly.1000: 10:00. Amatsukaze's windsock, doesn't it make you curious~? ...eh, it doesn't? ...I see.
hourly.1100: 11:00. Commander, what are you gonna eat for lunch? Where are you going? Curry is good too.
hourly.1200: 12:00. Fufu♪ Afternoon curry with Commander♪ Rice nice, satisfied satisfied♪
hourly.1300: 13:00. When your stomach is full, don't you just want to laze around? You do become like that huh~.
hourly.1400: 14:00. Commander, did you see Yukikaze? She disappeared really fast.
hourly.1500: 15:00. Commander, it's time for a snack. Snack♪ What do you want to eat? I want...
hourly.1600: 16:00. Hatsukaze and Amatsukaze have changed. Right? I'm still normal, right?
hourly.1700: 17:00. Commander, sunset sunset! Isn't it nice, this time of day. I'm pretty fond of it.
hourly.1800: 18:00. Commander, time for dinner! Commander, what do you want to go eat? Hey♪
hourly.1900: 19:00. Eh? Commander is making dinner? I wonder if it's alright... Do you need help?
hourly.2000: 20:00. The Commander's handmade dinner, delicious! Cook again tomorrow!
hourly.2100: 21:00. I'm going to Yukikaze's place for a while. Nah, I don't really have anything I need to do there.
hourly.2200: Commander, it's 22:00. It's totally night. Time to sleep...
hourly.2300: 23:00... I'm fine! Since I'm on time announcement duty! I'm not gonna sleep! Maybe!
